vocabInfos.mediumDef:
1) to crush, pulverise, thresh
1a) (Qal)
1a1) to crush
1a2) to be fine
1b) (Hiphil) to pulverise, make dust of
1c) (Hophal) to be crushed
vocabInfos._es_Definition: (a) qal   aplastar; (b)   hacer fino por medio de la molienda, moler; (c) hif.   pulverizar; (d) hof.   ser aplastado
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 壓碎, 研磨, 打榖
1a) (Qal)
1a1) 壓碎
1a2) 細碎 (出32:20)
1b) (Hiphil) 研磨, 做成灰
1c) (Hophal) 被壓碎 (賽28:28)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 压碎, 研磨, 打榖
1a) (Qal)
1a1) 压碎
1a2) 细碎 (出32:20)
1b) (Hiphil) 研磨, 做成灰
1c) (Hophal) 被压碎 (赛28:28)
vocabInfos._stepDetailLexicalTag: [["meaning","H1854","to crush",13,"דָּקַק"],["in Aramaic","H1751","to shatter",0,"דּוּק"],["in Aramaic","H1855","to break up",10,"דְּקַק"]]
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Gloss: 壓碎, 研磨, 打榖
vocabInfos._zh_Gloss: 压碎, 研磨, 打榖
